content: f003 plymouth yarn company free with yarn purchase encore colorspun ribbed watchcap age size 8 - adult materials 1 - 100 gram ball of encore colorspun worsted weight wool blend set of double pointed needles size 7 or those needed to achieve gauge and 1 stitch marker gauge 4 5 stitches = 1 inch in ribbing loosely cast on 100 stitches divide them evenly between 3 of the double pointed needles place marker and join being careful not to twist the stitches work in k2 p2 ribbing for 10 ending at the marker on the next round begin decreasing as follows round 1 knit 2 p2tog around 75 sts round 2 & 3 knit 2 p1 around round 4 k2tog p1 around 50 sts round 5 & 6 knit 1 purl 1 around round 7 k2tog around 25 sts round 8 k1 k2tog around 13 sts cut the yarn leaving a 12 tail thread it through the remaining 13 stitches draw up tightly and secure weave in the ends designed by joanne turcotte ©1999
